chapter.title: News management
chapter.para: You can manage 4 kind of element, in the news management tool :

listitem.para: News : Internationnalized content (title, summary and text), shown at the bottom of the public page. Can be filtered.
Announcement : Internationnalized content (title, summary and text), shown at the middle of the public page, more visible than news
Information : Permanent internationnalized information, shown at the top of public page.
Categories : Categorize News and Announcement, definied by an internationnalized label and a color.

sect2.title: Overview page
sect2.para: On the public page, the information layout is the bordered panel on top, the announcement layout is in the middle, with the background and news layout is at bottom, containing the news list and the news filters.
News, announcement, information and category content will be shown in user language, if you have filled it, if not in the required default language of the forge.
User can click on News and Announcement to view the full content of the element on details page.
On the top of News public page, you have the administration button to go to the news administration.

sect2.title: Details page
sect2.para: On details page, user have the full content of a news/announcement.

sect1.title: Administration
sect1.para: On the administration home page you have four buttons to manage the four elements (news, announcement, information and categories) and at the bottom, a button to go back to the public page.

On each administration page (except information page), you will see the element list (announcements list, if you are on announcement administration). You will be able to publish, edit and delete element with action buttons in the last column of the table. And a create button is available on top of the page.

sect2.title: News and Announcement
sect2.para: For a news and announcement, you have to fill a publish date, set if published, a title, a summary and a content. Title and summary will be shown in the public page, content will be shown on the news details page.
You can link with a category

sect2.title: Information
sect2.para: Fill the information title and content, at least in default language (represented by a red star).

sect2.title: Categories
sect2.para: When you create a category, you must fill at least the label in default language (represented by a red star), and choose a color to associate to the category.
